basics.name: Prakhar Kaushik
basics.label: PhD Candidate
basics.summary: A cognitive computational science researcher focusing on 3D vision and AI.

references.name: Professor Alan Yuille
references.reference: Professor Alan L. Yuille is a Bloomberg Distinguished Professor of Cognitive Science and Computer Science at Johns Hopkins University. He directs the research group on Compositional Cognition, Vision, and Learning. He is affiliated with  the Center for Brains, Minds and Machines, and the NSF Expedition in Computing, Visual Cortex On Silicon.
